text: Robert Paton Bryce (7 July 1879 – 24 September 1958) was a former Australian rules footballer who played with South Melbourne and Collingwood in the Victorian Football League (VFL). == Notes == == External links == * *Bob Bryce's profile at Collingwood Forever Category:1879 births Category:1958 deaths Category:Australian rules footballers from Victoria (Australia) Category:Sydney Swans players Category:Collingwood Football Club players
title: Bob Bryce
